title: Find a Doctor
description: A. Lindsay Frazier, MD - Pediatric Hematology/Oncology. Dr. Frazier received her MD from Dartmouth Medical School in 1984, followed by a pediatric residency at Children's Hospital Boston and a pediatric hematology-oncology fellowship at DFCI, where she joined the faculty in 1990. She received an ScM from Harvard School of Public Health in 1993. In clinical practic...
